headline: What Allstate (ALL)'s Expense-Driven Margin Gains and Higher Dividend Mean For Shareholders
summary: In early February, Allstate reported past fourth-quarter 2025 results showing revenue of US$17,345 million and net income of US$3,832 million, alongside a higher quarterly dividend of US$1.08 per share payable on April 1, 2026. The company credited expense reductions, improved claims processes, and its "SAVE" program, which lowered premiums for 7.8 million customers, for supporting policy growth and stronger profitability. We’ll now examine how Allstate’s expense-driven margin improvement,...
